entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
